amendment.description: Amendment conforms the language of the bill to comply with the provisions of the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade relating to cost-sharing; and increases from 20 percent to 25 percent the amount of non-federal funding for hydrogen research projects.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to conform the language of the bill to comply with the provisions of the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade relating to cost-sharing. The amendment would, among other things, increase from 20% to 25% the amount of non-federal funding for hydrogen research projects.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walker amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
